blogPost.excerpt: "The quality of our relationships determines the quality of our lives." -Esther Perel Call Your Friends helps you develop the habits and skills to build closer connections with friends and family through simple text reminders.
blogPost.body: "The quality of our relationships determines the quality of our lives." -Esther Perel Call Your Friends helps you develop the habits and skills to build closer connections with friends and family through simple text reminders.
blogPost.title: Call Your Friends - Dramatically raise the quality of your friendships.
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: "我们的关系质量决定了我们生活的质量。" --Esther Perel《给你的朋友打电话》帮助你养成通过简单的文字提醒与朋友和家人建立更紧密联系的习惯和技能。
localize.tagline: 大幅提升你的友谊质量。

localize.description: "我們的關係質量決定了我們生活的質量。" --Esther Perel《給你的朋友打電話》幫助你養成通過簡單的文字提醒與朋友和家人建立更緊密聯繫的習慣和技能。
localize.tagline: 大幅提升你的友誼質量。
